Reviews.Title: The Picture Quality is AMAZING!....if you get the settings juuust right ;)
Reviews.Author: Jonathan Marinos
Reviews.Content: At first glance, this TV was substandard at best. But as some of you guys know, HDTVs never show its peak visual potential out of the box....you have to mess around with its settings until you find the picture you are looking for. and YES that could be a challenge!!! i almost gave up on the TV until i looked up some other people's own personal settings....none of them worked for me so i bit the bullet and tweaked the settings for a few hours myself. sometimes you just gotta take matters into your own hands. And after all the tedious tweaking I HAVE FOUND THE PERFECT SETTINGS for both DVR and Video Games/Blu Ray!!! Give these settings a try and you won't be Disappointed! Before you read my settings just know that i like my TV nice and bright. if you don't like it as bright you can always set the backlight down to your liking. i feel these settings give you ultra light colors and the best lows i feel the TV could offer. A perfect blend. Here they are.PICTURE:StandardBacklight  18 (adjust if too bright)Contrast  90Brightness 42sharpness  25 (no more than 30)color  44tint  G50/R50Advanced Settings:Color Space  AutoGamma  +1Dynamic Contrast  Low (or OFF if you contrast is too dark for your taste)Black Tone  OFFFlesh Tone 0 (no more than +1)Motion Lighting OFFWHITE BALANCER-Offset  18 (set to 17 if there is still a slight red hue. i noticed a slight red coloring when watching SD films so i set it back 1 notch and it looked fine)G-Offset  20B-Offset  20R-Gain  25G-Gain  25B-Gain  25(if you set your color offsets too high then your blacks with have a Red, green or blue tint to them. which can be very distracting)PiCTURE OPTIONSColor Tone  Standard (Cool also looks great for movies and video games with these settings)Size  Screen FitDigital Noise Filter  OFFHDMI Black Level  Normal or Low (unless option is greyed out, in which "Normal" looks great too with these settings. i have my cable input setting at normal and PS4 input set to LOW.Film Mode  OFFAuto Motion Plus  OFF (if you like the Soap Opera look then set to Clear or Smooth. I do feel like it hinders the quality of the image at times though)LED Motion Plus OFFThere Ya Go!!! Hope This helps get your TV up and running! let me know what you think! and yes, everybody's eyes are different so feel free to make minor adjustments (give or take) but yes it will get you in the right path!

Reviews.Title: Great samsung tv for the money
Reviews.Author: Brian Clark
Reviews.Content: This is a 2014 samsung model tv that has a great picture.  It doesn't have the Smart tv function but you can buy a roku or use directv to get those features.

Reviews.Title: No Audio Output, This information should be on the packaging.
Reviews.Author: Stringhammer
Reviews.Content: This TV has the best picture I have ever seen. BUT for some ridiculous reason Samsung did NOT include an AUDIO OUT feature/port or output.  Completely rendering this tv useless for a home theatre system. I thought it had a digital output when I was in the store, but when I got home it was just an ex-link, used to help diag issues with the television.  Its unfortunate, for 50 more dollars i would have paid for an extra port, now I have to take it back after learning the hard way.if you dont like home stereos, you will be fine and this will be a great tv. But if you think you are getting something great for all home audio, think again.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: OliverT
Reviews.Content: I didn't buy this from Amazon, I found it for $599.99 at Sears.comGreat TV, good picture and I am glad I didn't have to pay for a Smart TV when I am using  ROKU 3 with the TV.Yes this TV does not have an Audio out, but for those of you who prefer sound quality only delivered by a receiver it will not matter.Some Sound Bars have HDMI in and outputs which alleviates the need for an Audio Out.Settings.These are the settings I currently use to tune my TV.I used the Disney WOW Blu Ray Disc.Movie ModeBacklight 20Contrast 100Brightness 41Sharpness 30Color 51Tint g50/r50AdvancedColor Space AutoWhite BalanceR offset 25G offset 25B offset 28R gain 18G gain 23B gain 21Gamma +1Dynamic Contrast OffBlack Tone OffPicture OptionsColor Tone Warm2Digital Noise Filter OffLED Motion Plus Off

Reviews.Title: STUNNING PICTURE!
Reviews.Author: R. KING
Reviews.Content: I just can't say enough about the picture quality. I just needed a monitor as I use a Monoprice 4x1 HDMI switch w/ HDMI out to HDTV and optical out to my Bose surround sound to pass-through Dolby Digital 5.1This is not a touted Smart-TV, but guess what... if you display your laptop onto your HDTV, it doesn't get any smarter than that!  I display my laptop via Netgear PTV3000, which works great.You can't beat this price for a Samsung 55" HDTV! If you want a great picture, BUY IT.

Reviews.Title: Very nice picture
Reviews.Author: RickyZ
Reviews.Content: If the picture weren't so good for the price I would have given this 4 stars because of the audio.  I chose this TV because all I wanted was a basic 55 inch TV with a decent picture.  I don't need a Smart TV and 20 HDMI inputs and all the other bells and whistles so this basic set was perfect.  The audio suffices. There are no audio outputs!!!!  I wanted a TV I could add a sound bar too, but at the price of this TV I figured I could make the sacrifice. Every now and then the sound gets distorted at a certain frequency but overall the surround setting works for me and this TV is located in a large room in my house.For the excellent picture and brilliant colors, for those wanting to keep it under $1000, this TV is worth it.But I still keep thinking that for an extra 50 cents they could have added something as minor as an audio output.

Reviews.Title: Great picture!
Reviews.Author: ORB
Reviews.Content: I'm not going to compete with other tech reviews.  They are more important than what I have to say.  In fact, I printed out the specsone of the tech reviewers used as his settings and set my TV by them.1st thing-- Amazon's delivery system is phenomenal on these large screens.  Our 55" was heavy enough that I helped the deliveryman set on our table.  They call an hour before delivery to insure you are home.  They are capable of lifting by themselves, but Iwas able to help and speed the process up.  They also plug in to insure a working set.  Then, like Santa, they are off!2nd--the picture was awesome out of the box, but I didn't care for the Soap Opera Effect (SOE).  I looked through the reviews tilI found one that had the specs he used on settings and printed them out.  Sat in front of the TV and worked it out.3rd--I don't use the sound on the TV (which causes many 3 star reviews).  I simply bought a new surround system amp with HDMI  outs and run everything through it.  Most people would like to Audio Out to a soundbar and are very dissappointed that this TV doesn't have audio out jacks.  But there are workable solutions, like my amp.4th--Did I mention the picture?5th--Great price during Black Friday week, as Amazon was competing with Walmart on this unit.  However, do your research onany electronic device and read lots of reviews, they helped me immensely.Bottom line, from ordering to the delivery to setup; this was as smooth as it gets!

Reviews.Title: great tv but has some quirks
Reviews.Author: antonphotog
Reviews.Content: Very satisfied with my purchase for this tv. obviously you turn down all the settings to get a decent picture quilty, watching blurays on this is amazing, as well as playing some videogames!currently i have mine atbacklight 7brightness 44contrast 92sharpness 20 ( i dont normally use the sharpness that high i had it set to 2 before but there seems to be an issue with the tv and color banding, setting the sharpness to 50 pretty much removes the issue but that is waaay to high and makes everything look terrrible so i settled for 20 that number isnt too high and does cut the banding issue down quite a bit) if you dont know what banding is take a look at this image [...] i could really notice it while on my ps3 home screen if you look the background you can see the banding. its almost as if the tv isnt capable of displaying color depth correctly. I am a videophile and most people probably wont notice something like this until it gets pointed out but at least on my set its there)color 52warm2dynamic contrast offhdmi black level loweverything else is set to offi did set the clear motion effect thing just because i actually dont mind the way it looks, some people prefer to turn this off but i dont see it affecting image quality so i leave it on.there is also some noticeable back light banding on screen when there are panning scenes with a light background. from what i understand this is more or less normal to some degree on all backlit led tv's. coming from an older lcd tv with no such issues i was slightly dissapointed but the banding on mine is extremely light and i can pretty much ignore it, do a search on youtube for led back-light banding and you'll see what i mean.

Reviews.Title: Best TV
Reviews.Author: Chad D. Thomas
Reviews.Content: I was really looking for a bang for my buck TV. This TV has everything you need without all the fluff. No it is not a smart TV. Who cares?  I have a PS3 to game and stream when I need. Note- this TV only has 2 hdmi inputs. This is non-issue for me but one might need more. I also got this TV for $697 as a Black Friday deal, plus 3% back on my Amazon card which was a killer deal.

Reviews.Title: Best TV for the price I paid.
Reviews.Author: Matthew Adamo
Reviews.Content: I was able to purchase this the day after Thanksgiving at a good price.  Setting aside the long delivery time due to issues between Amazon and Tiger Direct Inc., the TV is an outstanding!  That said, I just noticed 120Hz in the title...first time I ever saw that. When I was considering purchasing the TV, I could not find mention of the 120Hz, only "Clear Motion Rate 240". Admittedly I am inexperienced with "newer" TV's. Nevertheless I feel this is tricky advertisement that tends to mislead. I suppose that's the goal...one I don't appreciate or condone.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for XBox One.
Reviews.Author: SDK
Reviews.Content: If you want a basic TV with a great picture this is your TV. Works very well with XBox One.

Reviews.Title: Great Picture
Reviews.Author: Steve Saunders
Reviews.Content: I / we love the TV.  It was easy to set up and program.  The HDMI connection makes for a clear picture.  The resolution is beautiful.  I especially enjoy watching the Kansas Jayhawks basketball.  So much detail.  Thanks for a good product, and an incredible buy.

Reviews.Title: so amazing its Too REAL.  lacking some very standard features.
Reviews.Author: David Arnold
Reviews.Content: This product is a great TV. but they left some important features out of it.  THIS TV DOES NOT have CEC/anynet+  I can not get it to power on automatically with my Samsung home theater like my old LG did.  This sucks as the work around will be a very expensive programmable remote.  I thought all TV did this by now...  come on samsung you had one job!.  But  once my lazy self switches the remote to TV and turns the TV on. the complaints stop their on TV shows but started watching a movie and I thought i was watch a  low budget film or documentry done in amazing HD . things seemed too real and lacked the "movie magic"  I think the picture was too clear and too revealing in action scenes.  this was an easy fix,  I turned off the Auto motion and just like that the movie magic came back.  I think the refresh rate was just too fast.

Reviews.Title: Picture so good it almost has a 3D quality about it!
Reviews.Author: Catpsyche
Reviews.Content: I saved myself a couple hundred dollars by getting this awesome HDTV without the Smart feature.  The Smart feature makes the internet available from your TV only.  It was a useless feature for me.  Instead, I have this Samsung hooked up directly to my PC with a HDMI cable and can watch my Blu-Ray, DVD's, and all internet activity, including; games, Youtube, and streaming.  Love this TV and the price made it a perfect fit for my needs.  Best price and quality on the market!!! ♥ :)

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Deal Queen :-)
Reviews.Content: This is a great TV!  It is very clear and much larger than I was expecting!  It is like going to the movies in your own living room!

Reviews.Title: A great TV that isn't 3D, smart, and doesn't have apps -- exactly what I wanted
Reviews.Author: Shane Conder
Reviews.Content: I've been happy with Samsung TVs over the years. However, I didn't the expense of a 3D TV, especially for the target location of this one, and I didn't want some app system that would just get out dated before the panel did. However, I did want a good sized TV with new technology. This TV has fit the bill.The colors are good, the brightness is great, and the sound is better than the 15 year old computer speakers with sub (so they got retired). (This isn't in a movie room, so it doesn't need to sound like it has 10" woofers and 15" subs.)Neither my wife or I like the motion smoothing effect. Overall, it just doesn't improve the experience -- and feels like it makes things look worse and can even make us feel woozy. So, simply solution: We turn it off. Of course, we have to turn it off in a couple of places and it goes right back on if the TV loses mains power for too long.It is truly free of apps, wifi, and other Smart TV features. We already had a Roku and Chromecast for such features.Mounting it on a swinging arm mount made for this size TV was trivial and the whole thing can move about when needed (useful if changing cables).The bezel is narrow -- the whole package is not much bigger than the 40" Samsung it has replaced.The price was fantastic when we got it.Overall, we're very happy with the size and features. Hopefully the line of feature-free screens will continue.

Reviews.Title: Glad I avoided the Smart TV gimmickry
Reviews.Author: Max Dickstein
Reviews.Content: Excellent value for its size and rich picture quality, but the sound is abysmal and needs the support of a home theater system. Enjoy lots of movies and live sports. Bought back in September 2013, no problems or regrets at all.

Reviews.Title: Great tv at a great price.
Reviews.Author: Darkest Rage
Reviews.Content: Might not have all the bells and whistles of some of the other models, but bang for the buck, you cannot beat this. The picture quality on this tv blew me away. Also a great tv for video games.

Reviews.Title: Second time the charm
Reviews.Author: Eric Haislar "Eric"
Reviews.Content: When I got this TV the first time. I hooked it up and it looked good at first glance. But then I noticed it had a few broken pixels and the right hand side had a white cloudy spot to it. When the picture was nice and bright the image looked great but during dark scenes the picture was awful with a giant white spot It annoyed me to no end.So I took it back to the store. I am happy to report the new TV is perfect. The picture is amazing. Blu rays look like you can crawl right into the picture. My one complaint is the lack of HDMI inputs and no audio out. But if you can live with that. This TV will blow your mind.Recommended.

Reviews.Title: Note configuration for usage needs done
Reviews.Author: jk
Reviews.Content: If you review the configurations and set them correctly then the screen is clear and looks great.  Make sure your fps is in sync with the Hz.  Otherwise you will have picture quality issues.

Reviews.Title: Great Tv
Reviews.Author: alrightcool
Reviews.Content: Really good quality TV, I wanted a bigger TV for my room and once I received the TV thought this was too big, don't care though still love it

Reviews.Title: Wonderful set at a wonderful price
Reviews.Author: jayrad562
Reviews.Content: Wonderful set at a wonderful price. Just what I was looking for at under 700$. Much easier to read the menus with a bigger screen!

Reviews.Title: All I can say is WOW
Reviews.Author: Mark
Reviews.Content: This is an amazing TV set.  I have seen a ton of TV's at best buy and walmart and this TV was a great value.  The shipping was a great experience, even if they broke the first TV before it got 200 miles out of the warehouse.  But I would still give the product 5 stars.

Reviews.Title: I love my new TV
Reviews.Author: Elanna Grover
Reviews.Content: I love my new TV.  Great picture.  It was a Christmas gift and my husband and son set it up so I don't know how easy or hard that was to do.

Reviews.Title: Great TV at a Great Price!
Reviews.Author: Janet
Reviews.Content: The picture is amazing!  I was really happy with the price I paid and the delivery service that Amazon provides.My only problem is that this TV only has 2 HDMI hook-ups.  I didn't think this was an issue when I bought the TV, but after a few weeks I do wish I had gotten a model with 4 HDMI hook-ups.Otherwise, this was a great purchase!

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: tazman408
Reviews.Content: Love this TV. But of course I just like the Samsung  brand for just about everything I buy. It's been great brand for electronics for all that I have purchased in the past several years.

Reviews.Title: Worth the money
Reviews.Author: Draco222 "Draco222"
Reviews.Content: Work very well with HD programs, clear motion image, easy to follow on screen manual. In short, a nice everyday TV for news and movies.

Reviews.Title: Great Picture!
Reviews.Author: Alberto Berrios
Reviews.Content: Picture is crystal clear and is just the right size for our setup. It is wall mounted over the fireplace mantle and looks great.

Reviews.Title: Great color - Big picture!
Reviews.Author: Harriet N. Cunningham "Harriet"
Reviews.Content: This tv is huge!  We love it!  Can't wait for the Bowl games and Super Bowl now.  I fee like I'm in the action!

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Omar
Reviews.Content: This tv has an amazing picture, samsungs the best! So glad I went with this tv. Real good price too!

Reviews.Title: 55" Samsung LED
Reviews.Author: David Kessling
Reviews.Content: This tv is outstanding in all aspects, exceeding my expectations.  I have always purchased Sony t.v.'s, currently four of them in my home.  I shall however over time replace them with Samsung as they are clearly a better quality t.v., very impressed.

Reviews.Title: No frills, great picture
Reviews.Author: Dennis Murphy
Reviews.Content: If all you need is a monitor and handle all your A/V processing elsewhere, this TV is a great addition. The picture is beautiful, and i couldn't justify another $200 for the 60".

Reviews.Title: One draw back
Reviews.Author: mark malkin
Reviews.Content: Great picture only drawback there is no sound out jack at all,  so if you are going to add a sound bar ,  you might want to rethink it.

Reviews.Title: The most amazing TV I've ever owned
Reviews.Author: Michael Arnold "Web Developer"
Reviews.Content: I'll keep this short and sweet. Read the more technical reviews if you want more of an in-depth explanation.I am a huge tech geek. I own all seasons of Stargate SG1, all episodes of all Star Treks, all 6 Star Wars movies, etc etc. I recently moved into my own place for the first time and while I don't watch much actual TV, I wanted a large TV for the in-home movie feel and to entertain guests! After weeks of research I settled on this TV.I couldn't be happier! Watching the blu-ray versions of Star Wars Ep 4 on this TV is a whole new level of experience. It's like a new movie!

Reviews.Title: Nice for the price
Reviews.Author: Charles
Reviews.Content: You can't beat Samsung quality and not at this price. We'll worth the money and easy to set-up out of the box.

Reviews.Title: It's great!
Reviews.Author: Jan Johnson
Reviews.Content: We like the TV for the price, the name brand and even though we've just had it working a few days, it works great!  We highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: 55" Samsung H.D. TV
Reviews.Author: Dan Lazenby
Reviews.Content: I received the T.V. in perfect condition. Assembled the wall mount & hung the T.V. with ease. Am enjoying it, perfect picture.

Reviews.Title: Happy
Reviews.Author: John Bailey
Reviews.Content: The believe the listes Item was just as described and fictions as stated in add. Very pleased with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Crow Woods
Reviews.Content: Works great. The white glove delivery was an added plus. They set up the TV. All I had to do was connect to my blu-ray player and antenna.

Reviews.Title: Great TV!
Reviews.Author: Chase A. Ridgley
Reviews.Content: It was easy to set up and feels very sturdy sitting on a tv stand. The picture is also excellent. Despite not having an audio output, the built in speakers sound great.

Reviews.Title: Great picture.
Reviews.Author: Judith A. Forte
Reviews.Content: Love this TV.  Picture is great and sound is good.  Number of input jacks is limited but if you don't need them this is the set to consider.

Reviews.Title: i really like picture quality
Reviews.Author: jrfern132
Reviews.Content: Samsung is best picture, I like toggle switch if I loose remote,,,and watching blueray  movies off Samsung smart bd player

Reviews.Title: Awesome display but lacks inputs
Reviews.Author: Jerry Neutron
Reviews.Content: // To view this video download Flash Player (version 9.0.115 or higher)'); } } catch(err) { fp_resizePlayerSpace('cv_mo2JQ1VW3YEXXGI', 0, 0); } return false; } function _cv_mo2JQ1VW3YEXXGIloadSwf(movieID, playerVersion) { var swfLocation = "http://g-ecx.images-amazon.com/images/G/01/am3/20120510035744301/AMPlayer._V148501545_.swf"; logTag.type = "text/javascript"; logTag.src = "/gp/customer-media/du/log.html?ie=UTF8&p=CustomerImage&s=CustomerVideoPlay"; head[0].appendChild(logTag); } if (cv_mo2JQ1VW3YEXXGIcurrentClick) { return cv_mo2JQ1VW3YEXXGIcurrentClick(); } } } Length:: 4:00 MinsThis TV has an awesome display. It blows my much more expensive but older Samsung LED TV out of the water. Unfortunately it lacks inputs so you should probably use an A/V receiver or designate this as your bedroom TV.This video overview is from the JerryNeutron YouTube channel. Feel free to subscribe after you watch the video :D

Reviews.Title: Good for the Price
Reviews.Author: John J Hart
Reviews.Content: Picture quality is good for standard 120 Hz however the sound is very weak and it does not have a amplifier. Nothing that a sound bar would remedy. Shipping was great as it even came a few days earlier than expected. For price comparison and size you can go wrong. It does not have WiFi however using a Wifi Blue-Ray/DVD and it is no biggie.

Reviews.Title: Not quite what I was looking for
Reviews.Author: Nicholas Manning
Reviews.Content: I'm sure that the tv would have been awesome if it had worked when I got the thing. When I turned it on only random color lines were displayed and as pretty as those lines were, I kind of wanted a more cohesive picture. However, that said, I have bought multiple Samsung products and this is the first time that one of them has malfunctioned.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for this price.
Reviews.Author: M. Weiss
Reviews.Content: So I highly skeptical when purchasing a TV for this price. I've bought cheaper TVs before only to have a terrible experience with it. I bought a 42 inch Westinghouse only to find out this TV likes to shut off on its own quite often. I like to use my TVs to game so this can be quite frustrating. So when I got this TV I of course hooked it up immediately. I gamed on it all weekend to see if it would give any issues and it didn't. It delivered in quality perfectly. My HD channels on AT&T; U-verse looked great. The picture is so crisp and beautiful. I definitely recommend this TV to anyone who likes to watch TV in HD or even is a semi-heavy gamer.

Reviews.Title: Great tv, dedicated delivery men got job done in -23 degree weather (I'm not talking wind chill!)
Reviews.Author: William
Reviews.Content: Amazon is great to do biz with.This Samsung tv has a wonderful picture and great value for the money.Only down side is I wish tv had a headphone jack with adjustable volume via tv remote.

Reviews.Title: Very happy
Reviews.Author: NJ Patti
Reviews.Content: Great picture, perfect HDTV for our basement family room which is primiarly for kids video games, movies and sports.  Very happy, great price.

Reviews.Title: Its soooooo BIG!
Reviews.Author: Jerry M. Baskin
Reviews.Content: The picture is so clear and large that it takes a while to get used to it.  We had been watching a 37 inch 720p Sanyo for several years and this one is so good that it shows up some of the bad pixelating in some of the locally prepared advertisements.  The main characters on the screen, especially movies, almost seem to be in the room with you.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price
Reviews.Author: Daniel Hintz
Reviews.Content: Would be nice if it had a few more inputs and the menu's are a little difficult to navigate compared to our old Vizio but the picture more than makes up for it.

Reviews.Title: Defective and not what we wanted.
Reviews.Author: PINS
Reviews.Content: We recently ordered this television from a dealer other than Amazon.  We had it delivered and it arrived yesterday (12/13/2013).  When we attempted to set it up we noticed that the base/stand would not attach to the body of the TV.  Apparently, the base was warped. We also noticed that the TV stand would not swivel - because it was stationary the only way to turn the TV was turn the entire set.  Then we noticed that we could not plug in our stereo system for surround sound as there were no connectors!  The only component we could attach is our DVD player.  Be warned if you are thinking of buying this TV - we have returned it to the dealer.  Not what we thought it would be.  We have an older Samsun 42 inch set that we are very happy with although it is dated.  Guess we'll keep it as our main TV a little longer.

Reviews.Title: Great TV.  Very affordable.
Reviews.Author: Justis
Reviews.Content: Purchased this TV because of a black friday deal Amazon was promoting for $699.00 incl/ free shipping (unfortunately, tax costs astronomical in NYC).In any case, delivery was right on time (as scheduled).  Delivery person was quite friendly to deal with (good job choosing CEVA).  TV works great with the exception that it's way too big for my house.  I love the fact that this TV is basically borderless and the setup was very simple.  Only issue is that when I plug in FIOS and click info, the TV says 720p not 1080p.  If anyone has suggestions to fix this, please let me know.Otherwise, great product, decent sound, worth the purchase.Satisfied customer

Reviews.Title: Good buy
Reviews.Author: David H. Martyn
Reviews.Content: Easy to set up, easy to connect.  Didn't need smart TV, because I had that on my Bluray DVD player.  Picture looks great.  Remarkably light, actually hung it with Sanus mount over the fireplace by myself - although probably should have had help.  All in all, pleased with the purchase.

Reviews.Title: Came Broken
Reviews.Author: P. Triana "Pete"
Reviews.Content: Ok this tv i have seen in person and I can tell you its nice tv with great picture quality but some bad angle viewing. It deserves a 4 star review for what it can do at this price.. So why am i giving it 4 stars if it came broken because amazon did an outstanding job at meeting my needs and replacing. the broken tv and helping me make sure that i was happy.

Reviews.Title: WOW!!! This Color is beautiful
Reviews.Author: Angelina D Munoz
Reviews.Content: I made this purchase and I am in love with the color.  I was not looking for all the gadgets that all the other Televisions were offering,  for the purchase price and so easy to set up, this TV was great.

Reviews.Title: Samsung television
Reviews.Author: Rafaelina matos
Reviews.Content: I thought tv was slim, other then that it is excellent. There should not be a limit of words  whatever

Reviews.Title: Would not waste money purchasing this T.V.
Reviews.Author: Harry B. Jackson
Reviews.Content: In one week unit started cycling on and off. Contacted Samsung. Scheduled repair . No show.Would not recommend this T.V.

Reviews.Title: NO AUDIO OUTPUTS - RIDICULOUS
Reviews.Author: Matt Tuthill
Reviews.Content: Completely asinine design. It's hard to imagine cutting so many corners in such a seemingly high-end product, but Samsung did it, and conveniently hides the fact that this TV has not one single output port. You won't find it mentioned anywhere in the packaging or product descriptions here. Never buying Samsung again.

Reviews.Title: Be HD ready - cable and DVD
Reviews.Author: Michelle
Reviews.Content: Bought from Costco two days ago.  We were ready to return it the first day.  The picture was blurry and we were getting motion sick - even from 14 feet back from the set.  We talked to Samsung (Costco customer service rep could not help & claimed Samsung was closed - which it was not).  Samsung said this is a HDTV and we need to upgrade our cable box to HD.  We did that today and WE ARE NOT TAKING THIS BACK!  Wow, what a difference!  Before the cable guy came I was able to go to the manual settings (in menu/mode/picture options/auto motion plus/custom) and change the blur and judder settings.  I had a reasonable picture but it was not good enough to justify $900 after tax and warranty.  You will need HD for this TV.Only two HDMI ports might become a problem.  One port for my cable box & one for my receiver.  I have plugged the TV into my HDMI 1080 Sony receiver but something is still wrong there.  I still need to upgrade my DVD player to HD and hopefully my WII will somehow integrate into the receiver or I will need another WIFI source - this is not a smart tv.  There is one yellow/red/white cable option which my non-HD DVD player was compatible with but, again, the picture was not worth the $$$.You might want to play with the auto motion plus options once you are up.  The standard setting makes the picture pop but if you get closer to the set the smooth setting makes for a better but less defined picture.  I now know who has moles and why I might have wanted a 3D set.

Reviews.Title: Junk! You can do better
Reviews.Author: Geo
Reviews.Content: For the price this thing is a piece of junk. It has a single hdmi out and no audio out. It is the lowest model Samsung offers. Do yourself a favor and look at the 6300 series (this one is 6000, three models below) for THE SAME PRICE @ best buy. This tv is JUNK!

Reviews.Title: Defective, but rectified by Amazon support
Reviews.Author: Geoffrey Janes
Reviews.Content: Unfortunately the TV was delivered defective.  We left it overnight to warm up from the cold, but after hooking it up the next morning all we got was a fade-to-white screen.Talked with Amazon support, and after a fairly long phone call I was offered a suitable replacement since they no longer stocked the 6003.  Amazon support did a great job turning a bad situation into a fairly positive one.

Reviews.Title: ****SAMSUNG ONLY GOOD FOR THE GARBAGE AFTER ONE YEAR****
Reviews.Author: Just Sayin'
Reviews.Content: *****W A R N I N G*****Do not buy SAMSUNG Televisions!!!  Maybe $2,500.00 - $3,000.00 is not a lot of money for some folks to spend on a television, but it is to me.  This is money I'll never get back, nor derive true enjoyment, nor value from due to the DEFECTIVE SAMSUNG product that I purchased.  After the one year warranty period SAMSUNG Television screens tend to show burn-in and ghosting with horizontal lines, along with very heavy distortion of picture on right side of screen.  This problem is systemic in all their LCD's and LED's.  Consumer's have complained all over the internet.  There are even numerous Youtube postings with the exact same problems as in my DEFECTIVE SAMSUNG model, as well as the same DEFECT in many other DEFECTIVE SAMUNG models.  This defect occurs upon start-up, and lasts for the first 15 minutes of trying to view a program. Then the picture gets progressively worse over time and continuously declines.I tried SAMSUNG's Executive Customer Relations Dept. and was told:  "We will do nothing but refer you to a local Authorized Repair Shop."  They were downright blunt and rude to boot!  I feel robbed of $2,900.00!Furthermore, I was informed that the repair will consist of a diagnosis visit, and then another visit to install a replacement "Panel" that costs $1,300.00 for the part plus $279.00 to install, plus taxes......all told, another $1,719.16....at which point the technician basically stated, "just buy another TV."SAMSUNG customer service also told me that their Televisions depreciate at a rate of 20% per year, and that they do not repair any of their products after 4 years!  Their own repair people told me to just buy a new set!!!If I save one family the heartache of losing they're hard-earned money on SYSTEMICALLY DEFECTIVE SAMSUNG TELEVISIONS, and a company that offers zero customer service....I'll be happy!  God bless....SAMSUNG CONS:No Customer SupportSystemic Panel DefectGhosting of imagesBurn-in on screenDistorted pictureVery expensive to repair

Reviews.Title: Lacks basic tv functions
Reviews.Author: magen
Reviews.Content: Bought the tv and wanted to mount to the wall but the cables only plug into the back which make for a difficult installation. There is only a power button on the side with no channel or volume buttons. Always need remote to use tv...big problem. Volume wwas not loud enough due to speaker on back. Picture was great however but we are still returning to the store.

Reviews.Title: Smart tv is horrible
Reviews.Author: MiSo
Reviews.Content: The remote is poorly designed and the apps do not support keyboard functionality. Imagine mousing over to input letter by letter to search Netflix.Great picture but I bought this because I wanted a smart tv. This is a big disappoint from a well known company. Don't expect samsungs smart hub to improve any time soon. Pick another tv.

Reviews.Title: Don't Buy Samsung
Reviews.Author: christi
Reviews.Content: I have a Samsung 56" that was great for the first 2 years.  Recently the TV started developing hundreds of white dots on the screen.  Seems that I have the notorious "white dot" issue that many other Samsung TVs have. A defective chip made by TI was installed and Samsung will not fix despite the huge number of complaints. The cost of the repair is $500-600. Customer service is of no help and refuses to take responsibility.This is a link to one class action lawsuit against Samsung regarding their TVs[...]

Reviews.Title: Dead on arrival
Reviews.Author: Raj
Reviews.Content: Do not waste your time with this product. It came DOA and Samsung has been incredibly unhelpful in getting it fixed. I now have a massive paperweight.

Reviews.Title: Design problem with
Reviews.Author: Syd
Reviews.Content: Hi -I bought a similar TV 4 years ago (Samsung 55in. 720p).  It was great for the first 3 years, but in the last year, the TV has started to rapidly change channels without anyone touching the remote.  Once it starts to change channels, unplugging the TV is the only way to stop it.I checked online (google "samsung tv changing channels by itself") and there seems to be a design problem with the entire line of Samsung LCD TV since it impacts multiple sizes and models.Samsung will only fix(replace) if within the first year.  Otherwise  they won't help.Buy at own risk.

ProductInfo.Features:
Full HD 1080p - The realistic detail of Full HD images invites you to enjoy a viewing experience that redefines reality.
Wide Color Enhancer Plus - Enhances hues by expanding the color range for a more vivid viewing experience especially beneficial when watching older film productions and non high definition content.ConnectionShare Movie
HDMI - High-quality single-cable digital audio/video interface for connecting the TV to a digital cable box, satellite box, DVD and Blu-ray Disc Player, PC computers, PC portable devices, new-generation tablets and devices featuring the HDMI output.
ConnectionShare - Lets you watch videos, play music or view photos from a USB connection without needing to use a PC or special equipment. Simply plug your USB directly into your Samsung TV's USB port and watch on the big screen with friends and family.Connections
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung UN55FH6003 55-Inch 1080p 120 Hz LED TV (2013 Model)
